title: Exploring Neural Symbolism
summary: A concise breakdown of key findings on how neural patterns map onto symbolic cognition. Exploring the bridge between abstract thought and its physical underpinnings in the brain.

title: Consciousness & Active Inference
summary: An overview of recent papers examining active inference as a model of conscious perception and its implications for understanding subjective experience and the predictive brain.

title: Intro to Transcranial Photobiomodulation
summary: A primer on tPBM: what it is, how it's thought to work at a cellular level, and its potential applications in cognitive neuroscience and mental well-being.
